mapper.select: SELECT m.email, m.mname, m.photo, g.field, g.quote FROM member m JOIN guider g ON m.email = g.email WHERE m.email IN (SELECT guider FROM follower WHERE follow=#{email})
SELECT e.eno, e.email, m.mname, e.field, e.lang, e.etitle, e.regdate FROM essay e JOIN member m ON e.email = m.email WHERE e.eno IN (SELECT eno FROM recommend WHERE email = #{email})
